skill.name: Performing Orthonotone Polychoral Instrument
skill.description: Guides agents through launching, playing, sculpting, and capturing performances with the Orthonotone polychoral instrument MVP. Use when generating music, soundscapes, or live demos from this repository.
skill.summary: Guides agents through launching, playing, sculpting, and capturing performances with the Orthonotone...
skill.author: Domusgpt

security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill with only documentation content. No executable code, scripts, network calls, or file system access beyond its own markdown file. This is safe documentation for a musical instrument application.

content.value_statement: Users need guidance to operate a complex WebGL and WebAudio synthesizer. This skill provides step-by-step instructions for stage setup, performance controls, scene design, and recording workflows for the Orthonotone polychoral instrument.
actual_capabilities: Guide stage setup with static server and browser configuration
Explain control surface mapping for lattice and timbre parameters
Describe gestural choreography with pointer, touch, and motion controls
Instruct on scene design with snapshots for instant recall
Detail tempo and groove engine with MIDI sync and sequencer patterns
Provide workflow for recording and sharing performance takes
limitations: Skill contains documentation only; actual instrument must be served from repository
Does not generate audio files or modify instrument code directly
Requires external static server and Chromium-based browser for best results
Performance capture requires system-level screen recording tools

prompt_templates.title: Quick Start
prompt_templates.scenario: Set up instrument for first performance
prompt_templates.prompt: Use the Orthonotone skill to guide me through setting up the polychoral instrument. Start a static server and help me enable audio and adjust master volume.

prompt_templates.title: Scene Creation
prompt_templates.prompt: Walk me through creating a custom scene with high lattice density and slow rotation. I want to create an ambient drone texture.

prompt_templates.title: Performance Mode
prompt_templates.prompt: Help me perform using gestural controls. Show me how to use pointer drags with modifier keys to modulate the hypercube in real-time.

prompt_templates.title: Recording Workflow
prompt_templates.prompt: Guide me through setting up snapshots for a performance setlist and help me document the settings so I can recreate the sounds later.

output_examples.input: Help me start a performance with the Orthonotone instrument
output: 1. Serve the project: Run 'npx http-server .' from repo root
3. Click 'Enable Audio' in toolbar to start the audio graph
4. Set Master Volume to your desired monitoring level
5. Select a Quick Scene (Neutral Lattice, Prismatic Bloom, etc.)
6. Check Live State Vectors for meter readings on axis energy
7. Toggle Focus Mode if panels are distracting

best_practices: Use Chromium-based browsers for precise WebAudio timing
Document snapshot settings after performances for reproducibility
Test MIDI connections before live performances to ensure sync lock
anti_patterns: Performing without first enabling audio in the browser
Skipping volume checks before adjusting timbre parameters
Recording without queueing snapshots in performance order

faq.question: Which browsers work best with the Orthonotone instrument?
faq.answer: Chromium-based browsers provide the best WebAudio timing precision. Firefox works but may have slightly less consistent timing.

faq.question: What are the limits of the lattice parameters?
faq.answer: Dimension controls harmonic density, Morph affects shape morphing, Grid sets resolution, and Fidelity adjusts rendering quality. Extreme values may impact performance.

faq.question: Can I integrate external MIDI controllers?
faq.answer: Yes, the MIDI Bridge feature connects external controllers. Use MIDI Clock Follow to sync with external gear and verify Tempo Sync indicators.

faq.question: Is my data safe when using this skill?
faq.answer: This skill only provides documentation. It does not access files, network, or execute code outside of its markdown content.

faq.question: Why is there no sound after enabling audio?
faq.answer: Check Master Volume is above zero and Status panel shows AudioContext 'Running'. Reload the page if context is stuck in 'Suspended' state.

faq.question: How does this compare to other music generation tools?
faq.answer: Unlike AI audio generators, the Orthonotone is a real-time synthesizer you control directly. It produces generative soundscapes through gesture rather than text prompts.
